item.title: How to create and deploy your personal blog for free (beginners)
item.description: I recently spent a day or so researching the best way publish a personal blog for free. I wanted something fast and easy to use. But I also wanted the flexibility to customise the blog later down the line. Instant publishing platforms like Wordpress seemed too inflexible, so I looked towards other static site generators. I settled on using Hugo and am happy with the result. Within just a few steps, I was able to publish my blog for free on GitHub Pages.
